nodes.course_info:
UYGUR 202 Intermediate Uygur (5) VLPA
Designed to strengthen and develop further skills in listening, speaking, reading and writing and to deepen an understanding of the cultural context of Uygur. Emphasis on the expansion and refinement of linguistic and communicative skills learned in elementary Uygur. Second in a sequence of three.

UYGUR 203 Intermediate Uygur (5) VLPA
Designed to strengthen and develop further skills in listening, speaking, reading and writing and to deepen an understanding of the cultural context of Uygur. Emphasis on the expansion and refinement of linguistic and communicative skills learned in elementary Uygur. Third in a sequence of three.

UYGUR 201 Intermediate Uygur (5) VLPA
Designed to strengthen and develop further skills in listening, speaking, reading and writing and to deepen an understanding of the cultural context of Uygur. Emphasis on the expansion and refinement of linguistic and communicative skills learned in elementary Uygur. First in a sequence of three.

UYGUR 101 Elementary Uygur (5)
Emphasizes the four basic language skills: listening, speaking, reading, and writing in Uygur. Focuses on exchanging real-life information in the context of the native-speaking environment and understanding Uygur language through the cultural contexts. Cannot be taken for credit if UYGUR 105 taken. First in a sequence of three.
View course details in MyPlan: UYGUR 101

UYGUR 103 Elementary Uygur (5)
Emphasizes the four basic language skills: listening, speaking, reading, and writing in Uygur. Focuses on exchanging real-life information in the context of the native-speaking environment and understanding Uygur language through the cultural contexts. Cannot be taken for credit if UYGUR 105 taken. Third in a sequence of three.

UYGUR 102 Elementary Uygur (5)
Emphasizes the four basic language skills: listening, speaking, reading, and writing in Uygur. Focuses on exchanging real-life information in the context of the native-speaking environment and understanding Uygur language through the cultural contexts. Cannot be taken for credit if UYGUR 105 taken. Second in a sequence of three.

UYGUR 401 Uygur through Culture I (5)
Designed to increase functional proficiency in speaking, reading, writing and comprehending the Uygur language through reading and discussion of contemporary sociocultural and sociopolitical topics in a culturally authentic context. Emphasis on the expansion and refinement of linguistic and communicative skills learned in intermediate Uygur.

UYGUR 402 Uygur through Culture II (5)
Designed to increase functional proficiency in speaking, reading, writing and comprehending the Uygur language through reading and discussion of contemporary sociocultural and sociopolitical topics in a culturally authentic context. Emphasis on the expansion and refinement of linguistic and communicative skills learned in intermediate Uygur.

UYGUR 403 Uygur through Culture III (5)
Designed to increase functional proficiency in speaking, reading, writing and comprehending the Uygur language through reading and discussion of contemporary sociocultural and sociopolitical topics in a culturally authentic context. Emphasis on the expansion and refinement of linguistic and communicative skills learned in intermediate Uygur.
